name: Leslie Cohn-Wein
bio: Leslie Cohn-Wein (pronounced CONE-wine) is a frontend engineer whose client work has garnered a handful of Awwwards, a Webby nomination, and the Communication Arts Interactive Award. She now works on the product team at Netlify. Leslie lives in Dallas, Texas with her husband Eli, a chef, and their basset hound mix, FBI Agent Burt Macklin. She writes and speaks about accessibility, React, user experience, and the JAMstack.
